TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsColorContext extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource

Docs.summary: Represents the color context for a bitmap image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class has no public constructors. Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetColorContext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get a reference to an object of the class.
